document_data.name: ''Idol of Silvanus''
document_data.mainbody: The '''Idol of Silvanus''' was a sacred wooden carving of [[Silvanus]], the Oak Father, the god of nature known for his impartial fairness. It was located within the [[Emerald Grove]], a sanctuary of the [[Emerald Enclave]] in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Powers: The idol was the focus for a powerful ritual called the [[Rite of Thorns]], which would protect and seal away the grove from possible intruders. The statue also radiated a magical glow that made those basked in it understand the natural word a bit better.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the [[tiefling]] child [[Arabella]] stole the idol from atop its pedestal in the Emerald Grove.
